data.title: Hôtels proches de Gulskogen Manor, Drammen
data.meta_description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels proches de Gulskogen Manor, Drammen sur Trip.com. Que vous recherchiez des hôtels 5 étoiles avec jacuzzi ou des options plus économiques en banlieue, découvrez des offres avantageuses avec de vrais avis et notes de clients.
data.text:
A stay at Scandic Asker places you in the heart of Asker, within a 10-minute drive of Sandvika Center and Whale Beach. This hotel is 5.8 mi (9.3 km) from Kalvoya Island and 13.5 mi (21.7 km) from Kon Tiki Museum. Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a terrace. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access and a fireplace in the lobby. Grab a bite from the grocery/convenience store serving guests of Scandic Asker. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily. Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Asker? This hotel has 7384 square feet (686 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 167 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Voir plus

With a stay at Thon Hotel Oslofjord, you'll be centrally located in Bærum, within a 15-minute drive of Viking Ship Museum and Color Line Ferry Terminal. This upscale hotel is 9.1 mi (14.6 km) from Aker Brygge and 9.1 mi (14.6 km) from Karl Johan Gate. Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a nightclub, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge). Enjoy a satisfying meal at Restaurant Claude Monet serving guests of Thon Hotel Oslofjord. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Bærum? This hotel has 21775 square feet (2023 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and 16 meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 248 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Voir plus

Located in Asker, Storstua Omsorg og konferansesenter is a 1-minute drive from Royken Historielag and 5 minutes from Lower Hajum Farm. This hotel is 3.9 mi (6.4 km) from Hyggenstranda and 4.5 mi (7.3 km) from Cementmuseet. Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a terrace. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access and an arcade/game room. You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Storstua Omsorg og konferansesenter, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM. The front desk is staffed during limited hours. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 20 guestrooms. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Voir plus

Located in Modum, Tyrifjord Hotell is on a lake, a 5-minute drive from Heggen Church and 5 minutes from Kroderbanen. This upscale hotel is 2.7 mi (4.3 km) from Vikersundbakken Ski Flying Hill and 3.6 mi (5.9 km) from Furumo Svommehall. Relax on the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities such as an outdoor tennis court. This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access, ski storage, and wedding services. Enjoy international cuisine at Hollenderiet Brasserie, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served on weekdays from 5:00 AM to 10:30 AM. Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Modum? This hotel has 6997 square feet (650 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite. Stay in one of 64 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Voir plus

Located in Asker, Thon Hotel Vettre is connected to the convention center, a 3-minute drive from Whale Beach and 5 minutes from Triangle Centre. This beach hotel is 5.5 mi (8.9 km) from Sandvika Storsenter and 8.2 mi (13.2 km) from Nordmarka. Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Enjoy local cuisine at Restaurant Ask, a restaurant where you can take in the garden view and dine alfresco. Or stay in and take advantage of the room service. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 8:30 AM. Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 155 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Voir plus

With a stay at Quality Hotel Expo, you'll be centrally located in Bærum, within a 10-minute drive of Viking Ship Museum and Color Line Ferry Terminal. This upscale hotel is 5.1 mi (8.2 km) from Aker Brygge and 5.1 mi (8.2 km) from Karl Johan Gate. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a fireplace in the lobby. You can enjoy a meal at The Social serving the guests of Quality Hotel Expo, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Bærum? This hotel has facilities measuring 18292 square feet (1699 square meters), including a conference center. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Stay in one of 301 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and irons/ironing boards, and housekeeping is provided on request.

Voir plus

Located in Hole, Sundvolden Hotel is within a 10-minute drive of Tyrifjord Golf Club and Nordmarka. This upscale hotel is 4.3 mi (6.9 km) from Kings View and 5.2 mi (8.4 km) from Mo Farm. Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge). Enjoy a meal at Lobby Bar or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 9 AM. Featured amenities include complimentary wired internet access, a business center, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Hole? This hotel has 5565 square feet (517 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 273 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring espresso makers and flat-screen televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with premium bedding. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Voir plus

A stay at Reenskaug Hotel places you in the heart of Frogn, within a 5-minute walk of Drobak Aquarium and Tregaarden Christmas House. This upscale hotel is 1 mi (1.5 km) from Galleri Finsrud and 1.1 mi (1.8 km) from Follo Museum. Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless internet access. This hotel also features concierge services, a television in a common area, and a banquet hall. Satisfy your appetite with international cuisine at Bolette, a restaurant which features a bar/lounge. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 28 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and minibars. 37-inch Smart televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Voir plus

With a stay at Emma Gjestehus in Bærum, you'll be 1.9 mi (3.1 km) from Sandvika Center and 9.7 mi (15.7 km) from Gustav Vigeland Sculpture Park. This guesthouse is 10.4 mi (16.7 km) from Viking Ship Museum and 11.2 mi (18 km) from Karl Johan Gate. Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless internet access. Additional features at this guesthouse include a television in a common area, a picnic area, and bike parking. Featured amenities include luggage storage, laundry facilities, and coffee/tea in a common area. This guesthouse has 3 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 16 guestrooms featuring microwaves. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers.

Voir plus
